long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arre O Babuchak! Looking for your favourite TMKOC episodes? Tired of scrolling like Jethalal running after Babita ji? 

Well well well, your prayers to Daya ben's "Hey Maa Mataji!" have been answered! Presenting TMKOC Shuffle - your one-tap solution to instant Gokuldham Society entertainment.

ðŸŽ¯ What's cooking in Gokuldham?
- Jethiya's Pick: Hand-picked episodes guaranteed to make you say "Ji rahe hai babita ji ke raj mai"
- Surprise Me: Random episodes faster than Sodhi's jeep
- Story Arcs: Follow complete stories like Bhide following his "Purana zamana"
- Episode List: More organized than Metha's kavita!

Perfect for:
- Your daily commute (don't watch it like Tapu doing his homework)
- Lunch breaks (better than Daya's thepla)
- Anytime you need a laugh (no babuchak was harmed)

Install now! As Champak chacha would say, "Jetha, dekhne jaa dekhne jaa!" 

Note: This extension is a fan project, made with more love than Jethaiya's love for Jalebi and Fafda! ðŸŽ¬
